Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 91st overall pick, by Minnesota in 2005...
Released by Minnesota on 4/1/2006...

Injured on 8/24/2009 with a Strained Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...

Had first career hit (double) on 7/8/2013, off Jimmy Gobble (HOU)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/8/2013, off Ricky Nolasco (STL)...
Won World Championship with Arizona in 2019...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Florida on 9/29/2022...
